tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Excellent Doctor with high rate of patience.
For any dental issues i would suggest Dr.Smiles

Ram koti, Hyderabad

I recently visited Dr.Smiles Dental Clinic for an RCT procedure and was thoroughly impressed with their sevices. 

The team Dr.Smiles, including Dr.Akshara, Dr.Aisha, Dr.Kiran, and Dr.Yashwanth, were incredibly patient and understanding. They took time to clearly explain the issue with my tooth, outline the treatment plan, and address any concerns I had. I truly appreciate their cl at communication and willingness to answer all my questions. 

I was very happy with the clinic's transparency regarding the costs. They informed me of the expected expenses upfront, and there were no hidden charges at the end. 

And last but not the least, throughout my RCT procedure there was little to zero pain and after RCT there is no discomfort though I felt a little initially but after a day no discomfort at all. 

Overall, I had a very positive experience at Dr.Simles. The combination of skilled doctors, clear communication, and cost transparency made a stress-free and positive experience. I would highly recommend them to anyone seeking dental clinic.

context: Teeth Replacement with Implants in three days,Implants(Fixed Teeth),
review: I have visited Dr. Smiles Clinic in the month of January 2020 for dental issues. Dr. Kiran has explained me about the status of lower teeth and need to go for Dental Implants after checking X-ray reports. He has so much patience in addressing our questions. He did implant surgery with all precautions and arranged implants within a week of time. He did many trials and followed up with Lab technicians and make this happen within time as promised. After i return to USA also he has following up with me on my status and giving lot of suggestions like a friend. Thank you so much sir.
reply_text: Kiran garu thanks for ur kind words. this will boost our team and We will strive to keep up the good work. Though ur in US we are just a phone call away to help you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had a wonderful experience. Very welcoming staff. They give excellent service with an effective pricing . The best dental care My mother has ever experienced for her complete Root canal treatment. 
Dr. Kiran has treated my mom and we would like to also thank all other doctors. Dr. Kiran is one of the most proficient and professional dentist I've come across. Thanks a lot Dr.Kiran for such a treatment and care.
I would recommend Dr.Kiran and their professional doctors team for anyone who is suffering from dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ** *** **** ************ ** ********** I had the most weird and misaligned teeth possible and he fixed them to a straight balanced smile in just 9 months. I've seen so many of my friend's cases, who had minimal imbalance within their jaw and slight crooked teeth but had to wait for 2-3 years to get them fixed. I'm shocked to see my own results. I'll share a picture of my 'before and after' soon, not now because I'm still not comfortable with my old smile. But you all need to see and know that this dentist does wonders. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an great experience with Dr Kiran who is very professional and understands the patients needs pretty well. I needed full mouth implantation which is rare and exceptional requirement and had to be done within short time span of time as i need to return back to US. He was able to accomadate it and had done an excellent job with the implants especailly during these tough times with covid situation and lockdown. I will have to visit next year for the upper jaw as there was a loss of bone due to some complications but overall i am very happy with his treatment and his expertise with implants.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited 3 or 4 dentists in last 3 to 4 years *** ** ** *** **** **** **** I had pain in my wisdom tooth for which I went to him. He and his staff were so friendly and boosted my confidence that there wouldn't be any pain and that's how it turned out to be. There was no pain, his hands are so stable and the injection pinch was not more than the mosquito bite. After injection, he gave me 2 minute to relax down and then in next 5 seconds the wisdom tooth was out. I was expecting some pressure in my gums while the process was happening but I didn't feel any pressure, the tooth just dropped on my tongue. Before the procedure I was shivering badly because of the fear of pain but after the procedure I laughed at myself for feeling that way. He explained why it was necessary to remove the tooth which helped me a lot. I have decided that I will go to him for any dentistry issue to him untill I leave Hyderabad.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback and time.it will boost our morals.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had overcrowded teeth, both top and bottom set. I did my research for considerable amount of time since I was apprehensive of getting brances in my mid twenties and fixed my appointment with Dr. Kiran. After the 1st meet itself I was sure that I don't need a second opinion since he explained my condition in detail and explained why invisialigns weren't an option for me. I went in with damon braces since I didn't want the rubberbands foing forward. I had an appointment every month that included wire changing/adjustment. We started with the top set and after 3 months we installed the braces on the lower set. After first 5 months we realised that in order to adjust the teeth according to my jaw we will need teeth extraction. Went ahead with that and it was a seamless process. Currently I'm at 1 year and look forward to finishing the treatment up. All in all highly recommend Dr. Kiran for any orthodontics treatment.
